participant_1.background:
I'm not the best at keeping up with my chores, but I try to do my laundry once a week.
My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog.
i have 5 children.
my favorite book is david copperfield.
My home is my sanctuary, a place where I can relax and be myself.

participant_2.background:
I started working at a convenience store until I found a new job in my field.
I'm learning a lot about myself through my studies and my experiences in the water.
to free my mind from feeling depressed i look up at the stars at night.
i need certain medications to live.
my favorite place is the mountains.

content.text: Hey! What's up?
Not much, just got off work. How are you?
Doing well! I love my job. I work for a book blog and I get to read all day long. It's great!
That sounds awesome! I'm actually reading a book right now. I really like it.
Oh, what book are you reading?
It's called "The Great Gatsby". It's a classic and I'm really enjoying it.
I read that book in high school. I really liked it too.
It's so well-written. I can't put it down!
I know what you mean. I read it in one sitting.
Wow! That's impressive. I'm only halfway through.
I love to read. I can't get enough of it.
Me too! I wish I had more time to read.
Me too! But I make it a priority.
You're lucky. I have so much going on with work and school.
I know what you mean. I have a lot going on too. But I make time for reading. It's important to me.
I'm trying to make more time for it.
Good! Reading is a great way to relax and de-stress.
I know! I love it.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Not really. I just work and go to school.
Oh, that's too bad. You should find a hobby you enjoy.
I know. I'm trying to.
Well, if you ever find a hobby you like, let me know. I love to hear about people's hobbies.
I will! Thanks!
